Peripheral Basics

Overview of some basic peripherals in embedded systems. GPIO, ADCs, DACs, I2C, SPI, etc.
Linux Basics

Linux Starter Guide. Covers burning an ISO to a thumbdrive, installing the OS alongside Windows, and learning the basics of linux. Tips and Tricks at the end
Starting with Raspberry Pi

This guide will teach you how to start working with your Raspberry Pi headless (without a screen and keyboard attached), including the basics like flashing your boot image, configuring your Pi, and connecting to it via SSH
